Class Human

  • java.lang.Object
    • Player
      • Human

  • public class Human
extends Player
    Represents a Human Player, processes the choices that the user makes.

      • chooseDiscard

        public Card chooseDiscard(Card D)
        Removes a Card from their Rack. This was rewritten for use in the GUI. This also updates the current score
        Specified by:
        chooseDiscard in class Player
        Parameters:

      • choosePile

        public int choosePile(Card Top)
        Have the user choose what Deck they would like to draw from.
        Specified by:
        choosePile in class Player
        Parameters:
        Top - The top Card of the Discard Deck
        Returns:
        0 if the user chose to pick up from the Draw Deck, 1 if the user chose to draw from the Discard Deck
